attributes.action: ensure that the entire United Kingdom is involved in any World Cup bid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the World Cup bid not include the likes of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland?  We're all part of the same Country and we all have stadiums capeable of staging at least a couple of the group matches.  Why should we be excluded?  It's disgraceful.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with FIFA and the FA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
